Contact

Lab Location

SJCAB Epigenetics is in Rock Hall of the UCSF Mission Bay Campus (Google Map):

Room 448, Floor 4, Rock Hall 1550 4th Street San Francisco CA 94158

Parking

There are two car parks in close proximity to Rock Hall shown on the map above:

Parking off 4th Street (charged by the hour) Parking off South Street (charged by the day, or 2hrs)

Public transport

There are two MUNI lines with stops in close proximity to UCSF Mission Bay: the T-Third St and 55-16th St.

  1. T-Third St. link
  2. 55-16th St. link

UCSF Shuttle

Several UCSF shuttle lines stop on 4th Street outside Rock Hall. Shuttles arrive across the street from Rock Hall (east) and leave on the same side of the street as Rock Hall (west), see map above.

  • The UCSF Shuttle map can be found here

  • The Next Shuttle can be found here
